meanings.definition: Short, amusing or interesting story about a real incident or person.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always entertains us with anecdotes about her childhood.
meanings.sent2: I love reading anecdotes about famous historical figures.
meanings.sent3: The anecdotes shared at the family reunion had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her anecdotes were like little windows into the past.
meanings.sent5: The book was filled with heartwarming anecdotes that stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Brief account of an interesting or humorous incident.
meanings.sent1: During the party, he shared anecdotes about his travels.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's show was full of hilarious anecdotes.
meanings.sent3: The anecdotes from the office party were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His anecdotes painted a vivid picture of life in the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's anecdotes made the lesson more engaging.
